title: 82/305/ECSC: Commission Decision of 28 April 1982 approving aids from the French Republic to the coal-mining industry during 1981 (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 28 April 1982
approving aids from the French Republic to the coal-mining industry during 1981
(Only the French text is authentic)
(82/305/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Government of the French Republic shall notify the Commission by 30 June 1982 of details of the aids granted pursuant to this Decision, and in particular of the amounts paid and the manner in which they are apportioned.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
